translations: n．Hotpoint是一家英国家电品牌，主要生产和销售各种家用电器，如洗衣机、烘干机、冰箱、炉灶等。

sentences.sentence: As a result, the study and exploration on industrialized agricultural operation has become the Hotpoint attracting lots of the scientific workers in agricultural theories and practices.
sentences.translation: 关于农业产业化经营的研究和探讨，也因此成为广大农业理论和实践工作者关注的热点。
